en.title: You are not allowed to ping %target-name%!
en.description:
<@%pinger-id%>, You are not allowed to ping %target-mention% due to your role. You can view which roles/members you are not allowed to ping by using the `/ping-protection list protected` command.

If you were replying, make sure to turn off the mention in the reply.
